data.text: @FactsThen @drsimonegold @SaraBelPonMD Given this backdrop, it’s criminally negligent to lie to the public about Covid19 vaccine safety in pregnancy. The data doesn’t exist to support such a definitive claim. To the contrary, it was on FAR less evidence that this that FDA denied THALIDOMIDE a license in the USA.

@FactsThen @drsimonegold @SaraBelPonMD Unfortunately, a pilot study in 15 women administered the Pfizer vaccine shows that ALL of them briskly mount an antibody response to their own syncytin-1 protein. It’s clearly a statistically significant change, the functional consequences of which are not yet know.

@FactsThen @drsimonegold @SaraBelPonMD …circles that lipid nanoparticle formulations almost uniformly accumulate in ovaries. (3) the theoretical risk that immune responses to huge quantities of spike, distributed in completely different ways compared with wild infection, might cross-react with related self-molecules.

@FactsThen @drsimonegold @SaraBelPonMD I don’t think Yeadon regarded this as a particularly LIKELY outcome, but the IMPACT if it did was so horrific that he wasn’t prepared to say “it’ll be fine, no worries”.
Since then we know (1) the Pfizer vaccine accumulates in rat ovaries. (2) it’s well-known in formulation….
